author: AFSpeirs

changelog.release_notes: Realigned battery icon to better match the location of the Quiet Time icon
Added Quiet Time icon
Added toggle to vibrate during Quiet Time on Bluetooth disconnection
Added support for Pebble Time 2
Fixed an issue where the battery icon was not showing correctly
Minor change to the language used in the Bluetooth section of settings page

Added a version number to the config page.
Updated the battery icon section of settings page to read better.
Removed custom date options

Tweaked the layout of the configuration page
Added support for more custom text:
 - Burns Night (25th January)
 - Boxing Day (26th December)


Known Issues:
 - The Halloween custom text does not work as intended (It shows then hides quickly when the watchface is loaded). I would advise not selecting this in the configuration page untill a fix is found.
Re-included support for custom text
Removed the option of having custom text shown on specific days
Optimised code
Minor layout change for Round Pebble's
Code optimisation
Fixed the Bluetooth vibration occurring when it isn't supposed to

Fixed an issue where you could not select black as a colour for the date
Rearanged configuration page
Reduced size of watchface
You can now choose to display the battery icon based on a low battery percentage or show it all the time
If you select no vibration it will change the colours correcly
Added option to toggle calendar week

description:
A simple digital watchface.

Designed to not be overly complex and give you access to the information you need (time and date).


Features:
  • Bluetooth disconnection alert - Will notify you when you are no longer connected to your phone (via a vibration) and the top and bottom text will change colour (configurable in the settings).
  • Configurable colours - The Hour, Minute, Date and background's colours are configurable 
  • Battery icon support - A battery icon will appear when the battery level becomes low (Configurable in the settings).
  • Quick View support

latest_release.release_notes: Realigned battery icon to better match the location of the Quiet Time icon

title: Simply Digital
